message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for it.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can see that you're serious about the product. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm counteroffering at $125.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $120, which is the minimum I'm willing to accept. Let's see if we can finalize the deal at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $115 for the product.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $120, Bob. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value. If you're still interested, I'm willing to meet you at $118, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product, and that's as high as I'm willing to go.

I'm not willing to go back to $110, Bob. I've already made several concessions. I'm willing to meet you at $117, but that's as low as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm going to have to consider other options.
I'm willing to walk away from this deal if I don't get a better price. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product, and that's my final offer.
